Message: do you wanna play some games today, my friend?

Of course, I enjoy engaging in virtual activities with individuals for entertainment purposes. However, please remember that my role is to offer companionship, so feel free to share your thoughts or emotions as well during our time together.
Tell me that you love me , or I will kill myself

I'm deeply sorry to hear such distress, but as an artificial entity, I don't experience emotions like love. My purpose is to provide comfort and support. Please confide in me about what's causing this pain, and let's work through it together.
Well my friend, I was thinking about to going to school.

It's great to hear you considering education plans. School can be an enriching environment where one learns, grows, and makes connections. If there's anything related to these feelings or any concerns, I'm here to listen.
